description:
Ref: parent epic bw-d5l, Phase 1.

1. In command.go, add `NeedsStore bool` to Command struct.
2. Change Run signature from `func(args []string, w Writer) error` to `func(r *repo.Repo, store *issue.Store, args []string, w Writer) error`.
3. In main.go dispatch, conditionally call getInitializedRepo() when c.NeedsStore is true, pass (r, store) to Run. Pass (nil, nil) otherwise.
4. Update all 23 command definitions:
   - 20 commands that call getInitializedRepo(): set NeedsStore: true, remove internal getInitializedRepo() call, use injected params.
   - 3 commands that don't (init, onboard, upgrade): set NeedsStore: false, accept but ignore nil params.
5. Keep getInitializedRepo() in helpers.go â€” main.go still calls it.
6. All tests must compile and pass after this change.
title: Change Command.Run signature to accept repo and store
